The Laboratory's primary mission is to support ITD courses including TLEN 5460 (Telecommunication Systems Lab), TLEN 5310, TLEN 5330, TLEN 5340, TLEN 5510, TLEN 5839.

Other laboratory missions include support for student and faculty research, industry partnerships, and ITD data processing and server needs.
